content: I have a similar problem using TB for android and Zen Internet as ISP. I set up TB for my ISP and it checks and says all the settings are fine. I then find I can send emails over WIFI from home, but not anywhere else. Using mobile data, I can't send emails from anywhere. I get a similar error "SmtpResponseParserException. Unexpected end of stream" I don't have this problem with Proton Mail, Outlook or GMail. I do with K9.
